trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_SEQ_00<tab>Rafold hopes to turn a curse into a cure.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_SEQ_01<tab>Rafold has asked you to harvest a grenade claw. Lie in ambush at Dalamud's Talons for a grenade, and slay the creature for its appendage.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained a grenade claw. Deliver it to Memezofu at the Ceruleum Processing Plant.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_SEQ_03<tab>Memezofu is thankful for your delivery, as he had just exhausted his supply of grenade claws.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_TODO_00<tab>Lurk at the specified location and slay a grenade for its claw.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the grenade claw to Memezofu.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_RAFOLD_000_000<tab>Danger lurks near Dalamud's Talons, as the winds whisper the presence of grenades.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_RAFOLD_000_001<tab>No petty pest to purge, but the price of pain pays a prize─grenade claws.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_RAFOLD_000_002<tab>While I'm unfamiliar with the reagent's exact medicinal effect, I do know it serves to pacify my alchemist; an effect alone I deem invaluable.

TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_RAFOLD_000_003<tab>And we will certainly need salves in the days ahead. When you have slain the grenade and collected its claw, I would ask that you deliver it to Memezofu directly.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_MEMEZOFU_000_010<tab>No, no, no... I'm afraid this won't do at all. How is one to perform alchemy without reagents? I cannot simply make something out of nothing!
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_MEMEZOFU_000_011<tab>Ah, yes, a grenade claw, and just when I'd run out! Good to know my pleas to Rafold were not entirely in vain.
TEXT_GAIUSC906_01041_MEMEZOFU_000_012<tab>I shall tend to the task of formulating potions at once. On behalf of the several lives you've saved bringing me this, I thank you.
